name: U.R.S.S
description:
Welcome comrades to a new soviet adventure!

Partner with a friend to save your country from a nuclear catastrophe, press your assigned keys to keep the reactor under control, if one of you goes overboard you'll both perish, now start working,  For the glory of mother Russia! 

  • Cooperate with a partner to keep the energy going.
  • Stabilize the reactor and keep it balanced to avoid overheating or freezing.
  • Don't stop or the reactor will explode from inactivity.
  • Read about the latest russian events while you are at it.
